companyInfo.Competitors: J.P. Morgan, MB Financial, Bank of America

jobDescription: Seeking data analyst candidate who can thrive within a dynamic environment, applying their passion and experience working with data to produce insights and support in a variety of investment-related contexts.Compile complex data sets from various sourcesCollaborate with business leaders to analyze problems, optimize processes, and present results to stakeholdersDeliver on ad-hoc data requestsIdentify data sets that can drive strategy, improve decision-making, and automate processesRequirements:Bachelor degree in Math, Statistics, Economics, MIS or other quantitative field2 years’ experience working on analytical projects; sentiment analysis examples a plusProficiency with SQLExperience with reporting tools such as SSRS, PowerBI, or TableauExperience with Python, R or SASAbility to clearly communicate complex concepts to colleagues with varying degrees of analytical knowledgeEOEWintrust Financial Corporation (including community banking and financial services subsidiaries) is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action/Veterans/Disability employer.
